### Temple Housing Renovations, Banff National Park - Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01018628

**Publication Date:** December 23, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2023, at 16:00:00

**Amendment Number:** 2
**Amendment Date:** January 10, 2023

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to undertake renovation works at the Temple Housing building in Lake Louise town site. The project involves the renovation of five individual apartments, including painting, drywall, ceilings, flooring, kitchens, heating systems, and bathrooms.

**Description of Services**
The contractor is required to perform the following services:

* Renovation of five (5) individual apartments, including:
	+ Painting
	+ Drywall installation
	+ Ceiling installation
	+ Flooring installation
	+ Kitchen renovation
	+ Heating system installation
	+ Bathroom renovation
	+ Repair of water-damaged areas, including walls, floors, ceilings, and insulation

**Price and Payment**
The estimated total value of the project is $100,001 to $250,000, excluding taxes.

**Submission Requirements**
This Bid shall be submitted following a “two-submission” procedure. Refer to SI04 of the Special Instructions to Bidders.

**Optional Site Visit**
It is recommended that the Bidder or a representative of the Bidder visit the work site. Arrangements have been made for the site visit to be held at Temple, Fairview Rd., Lake Louise AB, T0L 1E0 on December 28, 2022. The site visit will begin at 2:00 PM MST outside of the Temple Housing building in the parking lot.

**Contact Information**
For any technical and contractual queries, please contact:
Kenneth Lacanilao, Contracting Authority
parksbu.bannf@pc.gc.ca
Phone: 587-832-1894
Fax: 1-855-983-1808

**Submission Guidelines**
Please note that bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official. Bids must be submitted in either official language of Canada. All documents may be submitted in either English or French.

Don't forget to attach all relevant documents as specified in the solicitation package.
